description: Maitresse Madeline took some time to give us the rundown on the subtle arts of CBT, short for, as you may know, Cock and Ball Torment. As she demonstrates, CBT constitutes much more than just "wailing on the junk," and requires both communication and awareness on the part of top and bottom both, lest grievous insult be done to the family jewels. Maitresse displays her snappy expertise at the Testicle-Twisting Tango, while slave Curt patiently endures, though certainly wishes -- as you will -- that he could just briefly cross his legs.
title: Cock and Ball Torment With Maitresse Madeline
